name: Antasia 0.7.5
description:
For Antasia 0.7.5 (The versian on this page), there is creative mode, a nice open sandbox world, where you cant die, and have access to all of the blocks and as many as you want.

For later versians, there will be other modes, so follow me on instagram (https://www.instagram.com/jackieboi527/), youtube (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCp0GG0buZU6OiAp9dQbQc2A), and my website (https://jacksonnorton51.wixsite.com/jcnconsoles)!
